title: Fukushima Is Releasing Its Nuclear Wastewater
description:
Go to https://ground.news/scishow to stay fully informed on the latest science news, compare coverage and avoid media bias. Sign up or subscribe through this link for 30% off unlimited access.

More than a decade after the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant disaster, its operators are dumping once-contaminated water into the Pacific Ocean. Is that OK?

Hosted by: Stefan Chin (he/him)
